action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grick makes one Beak attack, one Slam attack, and one Tentacles attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}) from all four tentacles.
